titleStmt.title: The history of the reformation of the Church of England. The second part, of the progress made in it till the settlement of it in the beginning of Q. Elizabeth's reign. / By Gilbert Burnet, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.H. for Richard Chiswell ...,

notesStmt.note: "A collection of records and original papers, with other instruments referred to in the second part of The history of the reformation of the Church of England" has special t.p. and separate pagination.
Errata, p. [29] at beginning, p. 416 at end.
Reproduction of original in: Universität Göttingen Bibliothek.
